description.value: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

Ferol makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=necrotic average=true]] damage. The target must succeed on a [[/save con 13 format=long]] or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under Ferol's control, unless the &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} is restored to life or its body is destroyed. Ferol can have no more than twelve zombie;zombies under its control at one time.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage if used with two hands.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, Ferol has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
